text:
Miomir Dašić (November 15, 1930 — 28 October, 2020) was a Montenegrin historian. He a regular member of the Montenegrin Academy of Sciences and Arts from 1997 until his death. Dašić was born in Berane, Montenegro.
Dašić died on 28 October 2020 in Podgorica, Montenegro at the age of 89.

annotations.surface_form: Montenegrin Academy of Sciences and Arts
